name: Links 2.0
tagline: Save, organize and find your links faster than ever
description: Links 2.0 is a complete redesign of the app that helps you save, organize and find your links across all your devices. Built for iOS 26, it introduces a new navigation bar, a refreshed Home with Recent Links, improved filters, custom accent colors, a new settings screen and a brand-new app icon. Private by default and powered by iCloud sync, with no accounts or tracking.

name: Craft Thanksgiving Release
tagline: Revamped Assistant with MCP, Al, an API and Android Beta
description: üöÄ Craft‚Äôs Thanksgiving release is here! Your ideas, tools, and AI now come together in a connected workspace that feels effortless. With a smarter context-aware Assistant, new API & MCP connections, and a smoother flow across Tabs, Whiteboards, and the Code Editor, Craft turns thoughts into action. Plus: our Android beta is here!

name: NoSho.app
tagline: Grow your waitlist and fill availability fast with deposits
description: One simple link for businesses to grow their waitlist and fill last-minute availability with deposits fast. Make the availability you want booked fast visible to customers with one click, stop promoting slots you have hidden in a booking system maze. No more chasing messages or posting Stories that vanish in 24 hours. Just share your NoSho profile, automatically notify customers when new slots are added and get booked securely.

name: InsightTube
tagline: AI insights from YouTube ‚Äî fast, clear, effortless.
description: InsightTube feels like YouTube ‚Äî but built for learning. Search any topic, open any channel you follow, and AI instantly highlights what matters. It summarizes ideas, breaks videos into chapters, generates multilingual subtitles, and lets you chat with the content.

name: Interachat
tagline: The future of messaging  - Powered by AI
description: Interachat is a modern messaging app for chatting with friends, groups, and teams ‚Äî with AI built in to help when you need it. Talk normally, and use @InterachatAI for summaries, answers, opinions, or quick search across your chats. It‚Äôs messaging first, AI-assisted, and fully private so your data stays yours.

name: Live Resume
tagline: The Resume That Never Gets Old
description: Live Resume makes PDFs and resume links that never go outdated. Every PDF contains a hidden meta data & pixel that pulls your newest data whenever it's scanned, and your public resume URL always stays in sync. One update ‚Üí all past PDFs and shared links instantly refresh. No other resume tool offers real-time, self-updating resumes.

name: AstroAlert
tagline: Know exactly when satellites pass above you.
description: AstroAlert is your personal sky-watch assistant. It tells you exactly which satellites, planets, comets, and deep-sky objects will pass right above your location in the next 24 hours ‚Äî including spectacular zenith events above 70¬∞. Powered by NASA/JPL data, it combines real-time calculations with educational content, a full astronomy glossary, and detailed object sheets. The sky above you, revealed with precision.

name: Get Trippy Home
tagline: Save a turkey this Thanksgiving!
description: Trippy the Turkey has spent too much time playing outside and needs to get back home for Thanksgiving dinner. Trippy‚Äôs neighbor Fergus the Farmer can give Trippy a lift by catapulting Trippy air-born. For the rest of the way Trippy can glide or run his way back home. Can Trippy make it back home in time?

name: Shop with Copilot
tagline: Your AI shopping assistant in Edge
description: Copilot in Microsoft Edge now includes dedicated shopping tools. Get instant price comparisons, price history, and cashback offers directly in your browser sidebar. With Copilot Mode, receive proactive alerts for better deals and coupons while you browse.

name: AbleMouse
tagline: Now works everywhere + MouseCommander: a gesture-driven tool
description: AbleMouse expands support to Unix, iOS, & iPadOS, making it compatible with all major OSes. A new 3D-printable case for the board is available. The project also introduces MouseCommander (win), a new open-source component. It solves a key problem: how to use keyboard shortcuts and system tools without a physical keyboard or standart mouse. It opens a customizable menu via a gesture, enabling features like instant cursor "teleportation" via a screen preview, an on-screen keyboard and more.

name: Elder Care Check
tagline: Seniors verify online health claims using AI
description: Elder Care Check uses AI to verify online health claims targeting seniors. Upload screenshots from social media or paste text and get instant fact-checks in 6 languages with evidence-based alternatives. Free, accessible, and built for seniors.

name: GLITCHGUESS
tagline: 20 questions in a broken reality.
description: You or the AI hide an absurd secret. 20 yes/no/sometimes shots to crack it. Black void, pink shocks, broken borders. Guess wrong and reality glitches harder. Pure chaos in one click. Play.

name: SpacePigeon
tagline: Saved Workspaces for macOS
description: SpacePigeon lets you define full ‚Äúworkspaces‚Äù for macOS (which apps to launch, what desktop spaces they use, how windows are laid out, even which URLs open in your browser) ‚Äî and restore them with a single click or hotkey. It‚Äôs a lightweight, open-source app built on Hammerspoon ‚Äî combining automation power with native macOS feel.

name: Threat Road
tagline: A daily cybersecurity newsletter that‚Äôs actually fun to read
description: Infosec news that doesn‚Äôt make you want to quit tech.

name: SERPView
tagline: Search Console Dashboard, Without the Limitations
description: Google Search Console has the best data, but it is not easy to access. Switching between accounts is annoying, managing multiple properties is messy, and many important insights stay hidden. But not anymore.

name: Vibe Coding Academy V2
tagline: The Future Belongs To Product Builders
description: Want to switch from Product Manager to Product Engineer? A Product Designer looking to launch production-ready apps? Or hoping to boost your software development workflow as a Dev? Vibe Coding Academy offers evergreen video lessons and reusable prompts to keep you ahead of the curve! We offer short, actionable content on Vibe Coding that helps you ramp up as a Product Builder without having to invest entire days of learning. Get also access to an ever-growing Slack community of Product Builders.

name: ShipAhead
tagline: Launch your AI SaaS in hours
description: Skip the setup and focus on what matters with a ready-to-ship Nuxt boilerplate built to help you ship ahead, save time, and launch your product faster.

name: Showcase - A Social News App
tagline: News is Finally Social
description: Showcase is a modern news app built to feel clean, fast, and personal. Pick the categories you care about and your For You feed becomes a simple stream of quick stories and trending topics. In Following, you see news from your favorite teams, public figures, and athletes, plus the comments from people you follow. You can save stories, explore podcasts, and keep a clean profile. It‚Äôs news redesigned for 2025.

name: TinyDebt
tagline: Your debt tracker
description: Take control of your finances and become debt-free with TinyDebt. Track all your loans in one place, plan smarter payments, and see real progress toward your goals.

name: Pinrom Thanks
tagline: Thank someone this thanksgiving
description: Create beautiful LinkedIn banners to thank colleagues who made work better this year. Share your gratitude this Thanksgiving with Pinrom Thanks.
